title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - HSDPA-E8258 - HUAWEI 3G Wifi E8258 Web Cube HSDPA(6M)
specs: Huawei E8258 is a 3G wireless router which could support peak download speed to 42Mbps and upload speed to 5.76Mbps. It's also called Webbkontakt E8258. User just need insert the SIM into the Huawei E8258 and plug it to socket and it would work automatically to provide wireless network.* 3G Wireless Router* Support 3G UMTS/WCDMA/DC-HSPA+/HSPA+ (900/2100MHz)* Support 2G GSM/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900MHz* Peak download speed to 42Mbps, upload speed to 5.76Mbps* Indicators for Network status and signal strength* WPS and switch button* Multiple devices could access internet through Huawei E8258* Hardware and software requirements:- CPU: Pentium 500 MHz or faster- RAM: = 1 GB- Operating system: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1 / SP2, Windows 7, Mac OS X 10.5, 10.6 and 10.7 with the latest upgrades.
